css:
<style>
    .form-container {
        font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
        font-size: 12px; /* Set global font size */
        max-width: 800px;
        margin: auto;
        border: 1px solid #000;
        padding: 20px;
    }

    h2, h3 {
        text-align: center;
        margin: 20px 0;
        font-size: 14px; /* Slightly larger font for headings */
    }

    table {
        width: 100%;
        border-collapse: collapse;
        margin: 20px 0;
    }

    table td, table th {
        border: 1px solid #000;
        padding: 8px;
        text-align: left;
        font-size: 12px; /* Ensure table content matches global font size */
    }

    table thead th {
        background-color: #f2f2f2;
    }

    .footer {
        margin-top: 40px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    
    .signature {
        float: right;
    }
</style>
html:
{% macro format_date(date_str) %} {% if date_str %} {{ frappe.utils.format_date(date_str, "dd-MM-yyyy") }} {% else %} {{ "" }} {% endif %} {% endmacro %}

DETAILS FOR ESI

Full Name: {{ doc.employee_name }}
Name of Father/Husband: {{ doc.name_of_father_or_husband }}
Marital Status: {{ doc.marital_status }}
Present Address: {{ doc.current_address }}
Pin Code: {{ doc.pincode }}
Mobile Number: {{ doc.cell_number }}
Email ID: {{ doc.personal_email }}
Aadhar ID: {{ doc.aadhar_id }}
Permanent Address: {{ doc.permanent_address }}
Date of Birth: {{ format_date(doc.date_of_birth) }}
Gender: {{ doc.gender }}
Date of Appointment: {{ format_date(doc.date_of_appointment) }}
Do you have ESI with Previous Employer: {{ 'Yes' if doc.has_previous_employer_esi else 'No' }}
If Yes, Previous Insurance No: {{ doc.if_yes_previous_insurance_no }}

Family Details:

{% for family in doc.family_details %} {% endfor %}
Name (As per Aadhar) Relationship with Employee Date of Birth (DD/MM/YYYY) Whether Residing with Employee State District
{{ family.nameas_per_adhar }} {{ family.relationship_with_employee }} {{ format_date(family.date_of_birth) }} {{ family.whether_residing_with_employee }} {{ family.state }} {{ family.district }}

Nominee Details:

{% for nominee in doc.nominee_details %} {% endfor %}
Name of Nominee Relationship with Employee Percentage Address of Nominee
{{ nominee.name_of_nominee }} {{ nominee.relationship_with_employee }} {{ nominee.percentage }} {{ nominee.address_of_nominee }}

Bank Details:

Account No: {{ doc.bank_ac_no }}
Name of Bank: {{ doc.bank_name }}
Type of Account: {{ doc.type_of_account }}
Branch: {{ doc.branch }}
IFSC Code: {{ doc.ifsc_code }}

Date: {{ doc.date }}

{% if doc.signature %} {% else %} No signature provided {% endif %}

Signature:
name: ESI
